lead_paragraph: Luis DeLoureiro operates NFLStatAnalysis.net and is a contributor to the Cold Hard Football Facts.
snippet: On Sunday, Matt Cassel faced Pete Carroll, the coach who did not give him so much as one start at quarterback in four seasons at U.S.C.

headline.main: Cassel Had Chance to Show Carroll

abstract: On Sunday, Matt Cassel faced Pete Carroll, the coach who did not give him so much as one start at quarterback in four seasons at U.S.C.
